text:
Rules:
You will face different situations during the journey to save this lovely plush. The choice is yours to write down what will happen. But be aware that every decision has a consequence.
If Mich'mich undergoes too much degradation, you lose and Mich'mich will go to the heaven for plushes. If you manage to reunite Mich'michâ€™s human, you win.
 Press 'Enter' to start the game.
